content: zippy hat this is a very quick project and it s pretty easy to zip right through the pattern requirements size i hook approx 110 yards malabrigo worsted merino yarn tapestry hook to work in ends chain=chain double_crochet=double_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet single_crochet= single_crochet decrease= single_crochet 2 together chain 3 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to create a circle row 1 chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet throughout work 15 dcs into circle i like to work these stitches over my tail to weave it in as i go join with sl to first double_crochet 16 st row 2 ch3 double_crochet into same stitch 2 dcs in each stitch around join with sl to first double_crochet 32 st row 3 ch3 double_crochet into same stitch double_crochet in next 3 stitches *2dc in next stitch double_crochet in next 3 stitches* repeat around join with sl to first double_crochet 40 st row 4 ch3 double_crochet into same stitch double_crochet in next 4 stitches *2 double_crochet in next stitch double_crochet in next 4 stitches* repeat around join with sl to first double_crochet 48 st at this point circle should cover the crown of your head not the entire top of the head if you wish to make it larger continue increasing in pattern adding another double_crochet before working 2 double_crochet in next stitch ie next round would be worked ch3 double_crochet in same stitch double_crochet in next 5 stitches *2 double_crochet in next stitch double_crochet in next 5 stitches* repeat around join w/sl to first double_crochet row 5 ch3 double_crochet into each stitch around join w/sl to first double_crochet row 6 ch2 half_double_crochet in each stitch around join w/sl to first half_double_crochet repeat row 6 until hat measures 6 1/2 from top to bottom edge or till hat is approx 1 inch shorter than desired length shape band row 1 ch1 single_crochet in each stitch around join w sl to first single_crochet 48 st row 2 ch1 * single_crochet 10 decrease * repeat around join w/sl to first single_crochet 44 st row 3 ch1 single_crochet in each stitch around row 4 repeat row 3 fasten_off and weave in end
